channel.title: unanswered on Freedom Of Information
channel.description: Recent content in unanswered on Freedom Of Information

item.title: 23-00009-REMD
item.description: What a saga searching for information about a closed Commission meeting. Steps to get to this remend: Submit 22-00069-FOIA and get rejected (Oct 2021) Submit 22-03086-FOIA and get rejected (Sept 2022) Appeal 23-00004-APPS to get sent back to FOIA office (Oct 2022) There has not been a response to this remend. Acknowledgement Letter Previous Next     Page: /

item.title: 23-00095-FOIA
item.description: Gary Gensler has another interview with Jon Stewart and pretends to be uninformed about retail investors direct registering their shares of GameStop. I requested “any and all emails to, from, cc’d, or bcc’d with Gary Genser containing keywords ‘computershare’ or ‘DRS’”. There has not been a response to this request. This request was appealed for not having a response in a timely manner. Acknowledgement Letter Previous Next     Page: /

item.title: 22-03087-FOIA
item.description: This is a meta request looking for emails relating to 22-00069-FOIA. Having been through a few FOIA request/response cycles the initial 22-00069-FOIA wasn’t sitting right. Interested in any internal communications on why the initial request was withheld. Acknowledgement Letter Previous Next     Page: /
